questions.question: Ni ikihe ciyumviro rusangi cawe kijanye n’ugukunda iyi reresi?
answers: Ndi ntaho mpagaze kandi niyumvira ko itari ngirakamaro canke ataco imaze
Sinanezerejwe n’iyi reresi kandi niyumviriye ko itari ngirakamaro

questions.question: Ni nde yariko avugana nawe muri iyi reresi?
Ni ikihe ciyumviro rusangi cawe kijanye n’ugukunda uwo muntu?
answers: Uyu muntu araciye ubwenge cane kandi yatumye ndabikunda
Uyu muntu ntabushobozi afise bw’ukugira ico anyigishije

questions.question: Ni uwuhe murwi muri iyi mirwi werekanywe muri iyi reresi?
Ni uwuhe murwi muri iyi mirwi werekanywe muri iyi reresi?

Ni uwuhe murwi muri iyi mirwi werekanywe muri iyi reresi?
Ni uwuhe murwi muri iyi mirwi werekanywe muri iyi reresi?
Mwakoze gukorera hamwe aka kabazo nk’umurwi. Hoba hari ikindi kintu mwipfuza kwongerako nk’ukugira ico mubivuzeko?
Ni ikihe ciyumviro rusangi cawe kijanye n’ugukunda iyi reresi?
answers: Ndi ntaho mpagaze kandi niyumvira ko itari ngirakamaro canke ataco imaze
Sinanezerejwe n’iyi reresi kandi niyumviriye ko itari ngirakamaro

questions.question: Ni ikihe gice c’ireresi cabaye ngirakamaro cane?
Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri iyi reresi?
Ni iyihe ntumbero y’aka gakino?
answers: Gufasha abana kwumviriza hamwe n’ukugenzura ibikorwa vyabo

questions.question: Ni ryari abana bategerezwa kwigana ibikorwa bikorwa n’umwigisha?
answers: Mu gihe umwigisha avuze ngo "Samuel Avuze"

questions.question: Ni ibihe bintu utegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Ntegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure kwicara iyo bakoze ico mvuze ntatanguje "Samuel Avuze"

questions.question: Ni ibihe bindi bintu udategerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sintegerezwa gutuma abana bimuka bava mu kibanza cabo
Sintegerezwa kuvuga ibijanye n’ivyo turiko turiga

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu udategerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
Ni ikhe kintu udategerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sintegerezwa kuvuga ngo "Samuel Avuze" incuro nyinshi cane nikurikiranya

questions.question: Fata umwanya mutoyi muganire n’abagenzi banyu hanyuma mushireho ihangiro ryo mu ndwi iza. Ni gute mushaka kwimenyereza SEL mu ndwi iza? Fata urupapuro rwawe wuzuze aho hagaragara.
Ni ikihe ciyumviro rusangi cawe kijanye n’ugukunda iyi reresi?
answers: Ndi ntaho mpagaze kandi niyumvira ko itari ngirakamaro canke ataco imaze
Sinanezerejwe n’iyi reresi kandi niyumviriye ko itari ngirakamaro

questions.question: Ni ikihe gice c’ireresi cabaye ngirakamaro cane?
Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri iyi reresi?
Abana bazokwiga iki mu gukora iki gikorwa?
answers: Bazokwiga ukuntu ibishobisho bimeze kandi bavyiyumvemwo ubwabo hamwe n’abandi

questions.question: Ni ibiki umurongozi ategerezwa kwerekana?
Ni ikintu ikihe utegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
Ni ikintu ikihe utegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Ntegerezwa kwerekana ibishobisho kandi nkakosora abanyeshure mu bwitonzi
Ntegerezwa gusaba buri wese kwigirisha nk’uwushavuye

questions.question: Ni ikintu ikihe udategerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
Ni ikintu ikihe udategerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sintegerezwa kureka abanyeshure ngo bavuge ibishobisho vyabo, bategerezwa kuba bariko baravyerekana gusa

questions.question: Fata umwanya mutoyi muganire na bagenzi banyu hanyuma mutunganye ihangiro ryo mu ndwi iza. Ni gute ushaka kuzogerageza SEL mu ndwi iza? Fata urupapuro rwawe, hanyuma wuzuze aho hagaragara.
Ni ikihe ciyumviro rusangi cawe kijanye n’ugukunda iyi reresi?
answers: Ndi ntaho mpagaze kandi niyumvira ko itari ngirakamaro canke ataco imaze
Sinanezerejwe n’iyi reresi kandi niyumviriye ko itari ngirakamaro

questions.question: Ni ikihe gice c’ireresi cabaye ngirakamaro cane?
Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri iyi reresi?
Abana bazokwiga iki mu gukora iki gikorwa?
answers: Bazokwiga gutunganya amahangiro ashoboka kandi batunganye integuro

questions.question: Mu gihe abanyeshure badashoboye gutanga ihangiro ni gute ushobora kubafasha?
answers: Kubabwira mu gishingo cavyo bashushanye ishusho y’umuryango wabo
Gusabikanya uburorero bw’amahangiro yawe bwite mu kubikundisha abanyeshure
Kubwira abanyeshure ngo ntihagire ico baterera

questions.question: Ni ikintu ikihe utegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Ntegerezwa gufasha abanyeshure kugira intambwe nyezina, zigezweko kandi zikorwa
Ntegerezwa kuvuga gusa ivyerekeye amahangiro yanje
Ntegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure ko amahangiro yabo atari yo.

questions.question: Ni ikintu ikihe udategerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Ntegerezwa gusaba abanyeshure kwerekana amahangiro yabo
Ntegerezwa kwumviriza neza abanyeshure hamwe n’ukubaha ivyiyumviro

questions.question: Ni ikintu ikihe udategerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sintegerezwa kubwira abana igitegerezwa kuba amahangiro yabo

questions.question: Ni ikintu ikihe udategerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sintegerezawa guhitamwo abana barenga 2 ngo basabikanye amahangiro hamwe  n’intambwe vyabo

questions.question: Fata umwanya mutoyi muganire na bagenzi banyu hanyuma mutunganye ihangiro ryo mu ndwi iza. Ni gute mushaka kwimenyereza SEL mu ndwi iza? Fata urupapuro rwawe, hanyuma wuzuze aho hagaragara.
